titleStmt.title: The Scotch riddle unfolded: or, Reflections upon R.VV. his most lamentable ballad, called The loyal non-conformist.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Stand up Smectymnuus, and hear thy tryal ..."
Although Wing attributes this to Robert Wild, it is actually a reply to Wild's "Loyal nonconformist". Cf. DNB s.v. Wild, Robert.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
